title: oyaara nadhiyuDan
sahitya:
oyyaara nadiyudan uvandhE vanthaai
aiyaa un vadivazhagai kaaNaadha kaN enna kaNNE
(oyyAra)

anupallavi

thaiyalai maNam puriya thani azhagasaivil
paiyavE adi vaiththu pani malar kaNNaa nee
(oyyAra)

caraNam

syaama sundhara kOmaLaangaa
maayaavathaara madhusoodhanaa
vaayaara pugazh paadavaakinil vantharuLvaai
thaayaaga enaiththaangum thiruviNNagaraa nee
(oyyAra)
